XIII.i.7.B.1.b
.
Sending the Veteran’s Income and Net Worth Information to the PMC for Review
After receiving a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) pension-related home loan application, the RLC faxes documentation containing the Veteran and co-borrower(s)’ income and net worth information to the Pension Management Center (PMC) of jurisdiction for review.
The RLC uses an overprinted
OF-41, Routing and Transmittal Slip,
as a fax cover sheet.  The overprint also provides the name and phone number of the person to contact with questions on the referred materials.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Pension-Related Home Loans
